metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14731 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
ofx_proc_file in ofx_preproc.cpp in LibOFX 0.9.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by an ofxdump call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14731` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libofx6 - 1:0.9.10-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
ofx - 1:0.9.10-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libofx package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.10-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
